item.title: Union CTF 2021 (II): committee
item.description: Challenge Summary A committee was formed last year to decide the highly-sensitive contents of the flag for this challenge. Our informant managed to leak some data, but he was arrested within weeks of the committee's operation. All we have are the logs of the committee's meetings. Note: file fixed, please redownload Author: Aurel300 We are given log.txt that contains the full commit history of the flag-containing repository. ... commit dca4ca5150b82e541e2f5c42d00493ba8d4aa84a Author: Christopher L.
